name: Nightstar Chase
description:
The Nauri of Origin squeezed their home world to the point where resources were exhausted, and pollution levels became high. During the great migration known as Evasions, they moved to one of the contested moons of the system as they waited for their world to become habitable again. Fly the Nightstar, the fastest salvager ship of Origin. Collect abandoned - or not – supplies during Evasions, and sell them on the black market.

Features:
- Four unlockable environments.
- Randomly generated content on each level.
- Simple mouse controls
- Lasers and deflector shield mechanics by level

System requirements:
- Windows XP or later / Any linux distribution
- Graphics card with DirectX 9 level (shader model 2.0) capabilities (1GB DDR3)
- 2GB RAM (4 GB recommemded)
- 150MB free disk space
